description.raw:
On Windows, the configure.bat-based build process passes
all the ignition-math variables directly to the CMake call.
However also the classical find_package(ignition-math2)
works perfectly on Windows, if ign-math2 has been installed
to a default directory or if its installation directory has been
added to CMAKE_PREFIX_PATH or ignition-math2_DIR . This commit
adds support for using ignition-math2 as a "normal" cmake
package, retaining support for the configure.bat-based build process.
description.html: On Windows, the configure.bat-based build process passes all the ignition-math variables directly to the CMake call. However also the classical find_package(ignition-math2) works perfectly on Windows, if ign-math2 has been installed to a default directory or if its installation directory has been added to CMAKE_PREFIX_PATH or ignition-math2_DIR . This commit adds support for using ignition-math2 as a "normal" cmake package, retaining support for the configure.bat-based build process.

title: Fix find_package(ignition-math2) on Windows
